title: dasaratha nandhana
sahitya:
dasharatha nandana shrI raghurAm jAnaki vallabha jEjE rAm

anupallavi

 vasiSTAdi munivara parivrta shrI vAsudEva jagadIsha janArdana

caraNam 1

 brahma janaka narasimhanu janaripu samhAra naravara shrI raghurAm 
brahmANDa sthita sarva carAcara pAlana lOla vilAsa nayana shrI
 
caraNam 2

 caNDa varaganuja SaNDa timira mArtANDa kuNDala virAjita rAm 
dANDa kamaNDala maNDita karamuni maNDala bhaya gaja mrgEndra shrI hari
 
caraNam 3

 rAma jaladhara shyAma kalmaSa virAma mAva harE raghurAm 
rAmacandrapura vara shrI vEnkaTraramaNa bhAgavata varada parAtpara
